    @allure.severity("critical")  # 设置用例优先级
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("case", cases)

        allure.attach(body=case.case_data, name='请求参数')

            db.cud('insert into tb_user(name,passwd,email,phone) values(%s,%s,%s,%s)',
